layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x50
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x50
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,16) size 784x18
      LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,0) size 784x18 [bgcolor=#00FF00]
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 528x18
          text run at (0,0) width 434: "This paragraph should have a green background because its TITLE "
          text run at (433,0) width 95: "attribute is set."
